channel.title: NIGHTMARES with MALICE COOPER
channel.description:
NIGHTMARES with Malice Cooper Mon-Wed 6-8pm est I am the Voices in your Head!!! Nightmares with Malice Cooper Radio show ~FREEDOM TO RAWK, FREEDOM TO TALK~ more interviews. I had to start a 2nd page to have room for these great interviews. I'm a musician, and a poor one ok. Sorry for the inconveniences. Malice
[ Copy this | Start New | Full Size ]
Bands I do not go to your pages and take free downloads. I need your permission to air them on my show. Please email by clicking on the banner below, 3 mp3 tracks artist/title/label if applicable with permission for me to air on my Syndicated internet radio show Nightmares with Malice Cooper as well as, stations autos that I might have. If another dj wishes to aquire your music, I send them to you to obtain it for themselves. I do not share the music you have submitted. I also do not form opinions on your art. The beauty of your art is in the ear of the beholder. I let people decide what they like. I just am the art gallery for you to display your artistic works. Thanks so much for your continued support you all RAWK in my books. INTERVIEWS can also be booked using the same email address as the banner will provide you with. Sincerely, Malice Cooper
MALICE COOPER PARANORMAL PODOMATIC
MALICE INTERVIEW IN ISSUE OF THIS MAGAZINE
channel.itunes:subtitle: Interviews
channel.itunes:author: Malice Cooper

item.title: Nightmares with Malice Cooper - Beth Trissel - Author 05-07-12
item.description: A great conversation with Beth about her new book(s). Sorry about all the confusion, its monday. Luckily this conversation made it out reasonably unscathed. Enjoy. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: A great conversation with Beth about her new book(s). Sorry about all the confusion, its monday. Luckily this conversation made it out reasonably unscathed. Enjoy. Malice

item.title: Nightmares with Malice Cooper - Carlo Bellario - 05-02-12
item.description: A great conversation with a real Wise Guy. Thanks a billion Carlo, that rawked. Talk to you soon. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: A great conversation with a real Wise Guy. Thanks a billion Carlo, that rawked. Talk to you soon. Malice

item.title: Nightmares with Malice Cooper - George Smith - Zombie Exs - 4-24-12
item.description: A great conversation about a killer movie that I can't watch. Someone pick up this movie, I sooooo want to see it. Hurry up, times wasting. I want to watch it like now. I totally can't wait. Thanks a billion$ George, totally awesome. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: A great conversation about a killer movie that I can't watch. Someone pick up this movie, I sooooo want to see it. Hurry up, times wasting. I want to watch it like now. I totally can't wait. Thanks a billion$ George, totally awesome. Malice

item.title: Nightmares with Malice Cooper - Bernard Robichaud 04-09-12
item.description: Bernard brings his gun, and I bring my sword. LOL Actually very informational conversation takes place for a few seconds lol. Thanks a billion$ again Bernard, totally awesome conversation. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Bernard brings his gun, and I bring my sword. LOL Actually very informational conversation takes place for a few seconds lol. Thanks a billion$ again Bernard, totally awesome conversation. Malice

item.title: Malice - Carlos - Stonebreed - 02-15-12
item.description: This was awesome, I could have talked to Carlos for days. He gets to have so much fun. Super jealous over here. Enjoy. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: This was awesome, I could have talked to Carlos for days. He gets to have so much fun. Super jealous over here. Enjoy. Malice

item.title: Malice - Stephen Zimmer - Author/Filmmaker 01-16-11
item.description: Another great interview with Stephen. Sorry about my voice, I sang too much on the weekend. I'm alive LOL. We cover everything from SOPA to his traveling experiences. Almost up to date, playing catch up LOL. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Another great interview with Stephen. Sorry about my voice, I sang too much on the weekend. I'm alive LOL. We cover everything from SOPA to his traveling experiences. Almost up to date, playing catch up LOL. Malice

item.title: Malice 11-22-11
item.description: I get the giggles because Vinyl Record Talk show people tell me about a Canadian guy that bought John Lennon's Tooth off of John Lennon's maid's daughter. Apparently a true story that I well got the giggles over and couldn't stop talking about it. Here are all the clips, hope you have a good sense of humor ROTFLMAO Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: I get the giggles because Vinyl Record Talk show people tell me about a Canadian guy that bought John Lennon's Tooth off of John Lennon's maid's daughter. Apparently a true story that I well got the giggles over and couldn't stop talking about it. Here are all the clips, hope you have a good sense of humor ROTFLMAO Malice

item.title: Malice - Robbie Cooper - Second Coming
item.description: Robby and Malice compare notes on tributing the Great one and only Alice Cooper. You want to listen to the clones exchange notes. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Robby and Malice compare notes on tributing the Great one and only Alice Cooper. You want to listen to the clones exchange notes. Malice

item.title: Malice - Beth Trissel - Author 09-26-11
item.description: A great conversation, in which hopefully my filmmaker friends will check out her novels. Some are on sale right now, get your copies while they're hawt over at Amazon.com/bethtrissel Thanks a billion$ Beth, again it was a pleasure, and I'm still picturing your house. What an awesome place to get creativity from. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: A great conversation, in which hopefully my filmmaker friends will check out her novels. What an awesome place to get creativity from. Malice

item.title: Malice, Stephen Zimmer 08-22-11
item.description: I had no idea that the writing/filmmaking businesses were having as much trouble as the music business thanks to the internet. Support your authors, filmmakers and musicians and buy their art. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: I had no idea that the writing/filmmaking businesses were having as much trouble as the music business thanks to the internet. Support your authors, filmmakers and musicians and buy their art. Malice

item.title: Malice, Anthony Spadaccini, Barbara Lessin 06-29-11
item.description: Talking about serial killers is just so facinating. Finding out how the actors/actresses get into character is priceless. Thanks a billion both of you, this was amazing. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Talking about serial killers is just so facinating. Finding out how the actors/actresses get into character is priceless. Thanks a billion both of you, this was amazing. Malice

item.title: Malice - Stephen Zimmer - Author 05-11-11
item.description: This is a cool conversation. I found out what happens at these conventions and I want to go to them now. Very informative, and thats all you're gonna get. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: This is a cool conversation. I found out what happens at these conventions and I want to go to them now. Very informative, and thats all you're gonna get. Malice

item.title: Malice, Terry Wickham - Mantaray Pictures 05-04-11
item.description: I'm terrified already and I haven't even read the script or seen the trailer. Something tells me this ones gonna freak me out. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: I'm terrified already and I haven't even read the script or seen the trailer. Something tells me this ones gonna freak me out. Malice

item.title: Malice, Anthony Spadaccini - Filmmaker
item.description: I get to get more in depth with Anthony in the makings of the movies, enjoy. I'm not telling you the rest, you have to listen. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: I get to get more in depth with Anthony in the makings of the movies, enjoy. I'm not telling you the rest, you have to listen. Malice

item.title: Malice - Anthony Spadaccini 4-20-11
item.description: Anthony and I discuss Head Case, The Ritual and Post Mortem. Google them all. If you're intrigued with serial killer movies. I highly recommend the viewing of all 3. Deadly. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Anthony and I discuss Head Case, The Ritual and Post Mortem. Google them all. If you're intrigued with serial killer movies. I highly recommend the viewing of all 3. Deadly. Malice

item.title: Malice with Bernard Robichaud - American Sunset, Cyrus Trailer Park Boys 4-6-11
item.description: Catching up with Bernard, that sounds like a movie title lol. With shout outs and birthday wishes given, another fantastic conversation. He'll be back. Knock Knock. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Catching up with Bernard, that sounds like a movie title lol. With shout outs and birthday wishes given, another fantastic conversation. He'll be back. Knock Knock. Malice

item.title: Malice - Gerri Riggs - Ashland Court -03-16-11
item.description: I waited a long time for this interview, and finally was able to catch the elusive Gerri Riggs in town for this conversation. Enjoy. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: I waited a long time for this interview, and finally was able to catch the elusive Gerri Riggs in town for this conversation. Enjoy. Malice

item.title: Malice - Bob Pfeifer - University of Strangers 02-14-11
item.description: Bob and I have an amazing conversation. This is truly a conversation I will treasure forever, as its packed with knowledge. I hope this is the beginning of a great friendship. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Bob and I have an amazing conversation. This is truly a conversation I will treasure forever, as its packed with knowledge. I hope this is the beginning of a great friendship. Malice

item.title: Malice Reading Alice Cooper Bday Wishes
item.description: I tried to get everyone to email me, as fast as possible. I guess most just made posts right there on the pages I posted. See...I can't be in more than one place at a time either lol...Enjoy and Happy Birthday Uncle Alice <3 God Bless. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: I tried to get everyone to email me, as fast as possible. I guess most just made posts right there on the pages I posted. See...I can't be in more than one place at a time either lol...Enjoy and Happy Birthday Uncle Alice <3 God Bless. Malice

item.title: Malice - Michael - Cold Spell 01-24-11
item.description: I find more about Sweden, and the scene over there. Michael I loved the story about the Ice hotel. Thats all I'm giving you peoples. Listen in. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: I find more about Sweden, and the scene over there. Michael I loved the story about the Ice hotel. Thats all I'm giving you peoples. Listen in. Malice

item.title: Malice with ShadowGod 11-24-10
item.description: I honestly thought I could get serious with these guys, but nope. I'm of course still laughing. Thanks you guyz...lol. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: I honestly thought I could get serious with these guys, but nope. I'm of course still laughing. Thanks you guyz...lol. Malice

item.title: Malice & Jewel Throne WFLM 8/23/10
item.description: Jewel and I have too much fun, and get caught up in Rick doing a mic check, sound check from the studio. Lots of laughs to be had, check it out. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Jewel and I have too much fun, and get caught up in Rick doing a mic check, sound check from the studio. Lots of laughs to be had, check it out. Malice

item.title: Malice Cooper & Chuck Garric - Alice Cooper/The Barons
item.description: A stupendous conversation with Chuck. Short, sweet, to the point, no bsing around with Chuck ya know. Hes so serious and all that jazz. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: A stupendous conversation with Chuck. Short, sweet, to the point, no bsing around with Chuck ya know. Hes so serious and all that jazz. Malice

item.title: Malice & Bernard Robichaud - American Sunset/Cyrus Trailer Park Boys
item.description: Malice and Bernard have a conversation about the Movie industry, and thats all you get, you have to listen to hear the golden words. I could write a long huge description but why it doesn't all show up. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Malice and Bernard have a conversation about the Movie industry, and thats all you get, you have to listen to hear the golden words. I could write a long huge description but why it doesn't all show up. Malice

item.title: MALICE MONDAYS - TODAYS DATE IN HISTORY
item.description: With it being Monday, and something beyond the interviews control happening, this is what happens to you all. Rick has is way with us on This Date in History. It starts out slow, with me babbling incoherently about nothing really, and turns into my nightmare. Enjoy. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: With it being Monday, and something beyond the interviews control happening, this is what happens to you all. Rick has is way with us on This Date in History. It starts out slow, with me babbling incoherently about nothing really, and turns into my nightmare. Enjoy. Malice

item.title: Malice & R.A. Mihailoff
item.description: Another in depth conversation with R.A. Mihailoff, Leatherface, Texas Chainsaw Massacre 3, Hatchet 2. There were a few blips on the net but otherwise an amazing conversation. I hope we didn't give too much hollywood away in this one lol. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Another in depth conversation with R.A. Mihailoff, Leatherface, Texas Chainsaw Massacre 3, Hatchet 2. There were a few blips on the net but otherwise an amazing conversation. I hope we didn't give too much hollywood away in this one lol. Malice

item.title: Malice & Ross The Boss
item.description: Batter's up!!!! This is a short conversation with Ross letting you all know what he's doing these days. I think you'll all enjoy it. I put in the parts leading up to his calling in, for extra added comedic value. Enjoy! Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Batter's up!!!! This is a short conversation with Ross letting you all know what he's doing these days. I think you'll all enjoy it. I put in the parts leading up to his calling in, for extra added comedic value. Enjoy! Malice

item.title: Malice & R.A. Mihailoff - Leatherface
item.description: What an awesome conversation, I had no idea he was a ghost hunter too. Thats all i'm giving away on this you will have to listen. Don't forget to see the movie Hatchet 2 coming out around Labor Day. Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: What an awesome conversation, I had no idea he was a ghost hunter too. Thats all i'm giving away on this you will have to listen. Don't forget to see the movie Hatchet 2 coming out around Labor Day. Malice

item.title: MALICE Happy Bday show for Alice Cooper
item.description: Clips from my birthday to Alice show today. Probably only he'll get the jokes but, its his Birthday. Happy Birthday Alice Cooper!!! Malice
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: Clips from my birthday to Alice show today. Probably only he'll get the jokes but, its his Birthday. Happy Birthday Alice Cooper!!! Malice

item.title: Malice interviews Alex Grossi
item.description: A truly great conversation with a truly great person. Thanks Alex, I had a blast. Remember, you're just going to Canada for a few beers ok lol.
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: A truly great conversation with a truly great person. Thanks Alex, I had a blast. Remember, you're just going to Canada for a few beers ok lol.

item.title: Malice Interviews Keri Kelli
item.description: A splendid conversation with Keri one of Alice's guitar players, that is an awesome person. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: A splendid conversation with Keri one of Alice's guitar players, that is an awesome person. Enjoy!

item.title: Malice interviews Dennis Dunaway & Yenz - Iron Savior
item.description: This interview is incredibly special, as it had been a double booking, Yenz's was pre recorded at an earlier date. Before I had known Dennis was even going to be on the show. What makes this so special is they aired the same day, and well Yenz's interview has some of Dennis in it. Its probably one of the strangest things thats ever happened....yet strange things tend to always happen around me. lol.
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: This interview is incredibly special, as it had been a double booking, Yenz's was pre recorded at an earlier date. Before I had known Dennis was even going to be on the show. What makes this so special is they aired the same day, and well Yenz's interview has some of Dennis in it. Its probably one of the strangest things thats ever happened....yet strange things tend to always happen around me. lol.

item.title: Cooperfreak & her mom Rant with Malice
item.description: This is exceptionally funny, but also very sad, as its one of the last things Cooperfreak did before her passing. I will miss her forever. RIP Dear Cooperfreak
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: This is exceptionally funny, but also very sad, as its one of the last things Cooperfreak did before her passing. I will miss her forever. RIP Dear Cooperfreak

item.description: I love this one.

item.title: Alice Meets Malice
item.description: I had something witty to say when I posted this last time, but for the life of me can't remember. Thanks Podomatic for deleting all my files and making me do this over. I appreciate the extra work, that you've so graciously made for me.

item.title: Alice's Bday Card from Malice
item.description: I sent Alice a Bday card and Miss Kitty read it on air. Thought I'd share it, it means a lot to me.
item.dc:creator: Malice Cooper
item.itunes:summary: I sent Alice a Bday card and Miss Kitty read it on air. Thought I'd share it, it means a lot to me.
